name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:**  If SEER Primary Tumor is 000, Behavior ICD-O-3 must be coded as 2.  If SEER Primary Tumor is 100 or greater, Behavior ICD-O-3 must be coded as 3.
rows:
In situ: Noninvasive; intraepithelial

Carcinoma in situ, NOS
Noninvasive papillary, polypoid, or verrucous carcinoma
In situ, intraepithelial, non invasive (flat, sessile)

Localized only

Muscularis invaded
Subepithelial connective tissue (lamina propria, submucosa) invaded

Localized, NOS

Regional by direct extension only

Extension beyond the prostatic capsule

Extension to:
     Bladder neck
     Corpus cavernosum
     Corpus spongiosum
     Periurethral muscle (sphincter)
     Prostate
     Vagina, anterior or NOS

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
